page.title: 18SCHOOLS
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE A SCHOOLBOY HE WAKES UP AT ABOUT 0700HOURS,PRACTISES GUITAR AND WATCHES THE TELEVISION UNTIL 0800HOURS.HE GOES TO HIS GRANDAS AFTER GETTING WASHED AND DRESSED.HE HAS HIS BREAKFAST OF CEREAL.HE GOES TO SCHOOL FOR 0900HOURS.HE GOES HOME AT 1500HOURS.WITH HIS FRIENDS HE GOES TO THE PARK TO PLAY FOOTBALL.AT 1900HOURS HE GOES TO THE JUDO AT THE SPORTS CENTR WHICH IS JUST ACROSS THE ROAD FROM MOORSIDE SCHOOL,WHICH HE ATTENDS.AFTER JUDO HE TRAINS FOR HALF MARATHONS WITH HIS AUNT.NEXT HE PLAYS BASKETBALL AT THE SPORTS CENTRE.HE GOES HOME TO WATCH THE VIDEO WHILE HAVING HIS SUPPER.HE GOES TO BED AT 2230HOURS.
